```{r}
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(tidyverse)

oil_loss <- read_excel("~/Desktop/GitHub/InsideClimateNews/combined_h8.xlsx") %>% 
  clean_names()
```

## counting the number of incidents per company
```{r}
companies <- oil_loss %>% 
  group_by(operator_number) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))

companies_years <- oil_loss %>% 
  group_by(operator_number, master_year) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))
```
